Name: Contraption Maker
About the game: Play over 200 official puzzles and over 1,000 user created puzzles in the Workshop. Build your own ingenious contraptions and puzzles and share them. Use the many characters that interact in amusing ways. Create your own Cheese Factory or anything else that you can imagine. Make your own games with the built-in Javascript Editor using Contraption Maker's physics and parts. Play online to build contraptions together with up to 8 players in the Maker Lab. ** Contraption Maker is a 2-pack. Buy it and get a copy for a friend to build together! **
